list.name: Changes
list.comment:
chore: ðŸ—‘ï¸ add target/ and IDE-specific files to .gitignore
- Added .gitignore entries to exclude build output (/target/) and IDE-specific files (/workspace.xml, /dataSources/, etc.) to keep the repository clean and portable across environments.

task.summary:
docs: draft README for the online bookstore project
- Created the initial draft of the project README for the FastCampus Online Bookstore assignment - Planning to add UML diagrams, ERD, and API specifications in the next update

chore: ê¸°ë³¸ Maven ë””ë ‰í† ë¦¬ êµ¬ì¡° ìƒì„± (src/main/java, webapp ë“±)
- src/main/java, src/main/resources, src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/views ìƒì„± - ì•„ì§ ê¸°ëŠ¥ êµ¬í˜„ì€ ì—†ìœ¼ë©°, ì´í›„ Spring MVC êµ¬ì„± ì˜ˆì • - GitHub fork ë ˆí¬ì— ì´ˆê¸° êµ¬ì¡° ì„¸íŒ… ëª©ì

chore: update web.xml
- rename servlet and adjust dispatcher path for bookstore project

chore: configure web module and fix web resource directory for deployment
- Fixed incorrect Web Resource Directory mapping in IntelliJ - Registered src/main/webapp as the proper web root - Enabled recognition of web.xml and static/view resources - Resolved unresolved class/package errors (e.g., DispatcherServlet, ContextLoaderListener)

chore: add static resource directories and configure servlet-context.xml
- Created /static/css, /static/js, and /static/img directories under src/main/webapp - Set up mvc:resources mapping in servlet-context.xml to serve static files from /static/** - Configured component scanning for com.bookstore package - Registered InternalResourceViewResolver for JSP views under /WEB-INF/views/ - Included Swagger resource handlers for future API documentation

chore: configure Oracle XE datasource, MyBatis, and transaction in root-context.xml
- Set JDBC URL to jdbc:oracle:thin:@localhost:1521:XE - Updated driver class to oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver - Username set to 'system'
- Registered SqlSessionFactory and SqlSessionTemplate for MyBatis integration - Enabled automatic mapper scanning for com.bookstore.mapper - Configured DataSourceTransactionManager - Activated @Transactional support using annotation-driven configuration

chore: ðŸ—‘ï¸ add target/ and IDE-specific files to .gitignore
- Added .gitignore entries to exclude build output (/target/) and IDE-specific files (/workspace.xml, /dataSources/, etc.) to keep the repository clean and portable across environments.

chore: update web.xml
- rename servlet and adjust dispatcher path for bookstore project

chore: configure web module and fix web resource directory for deployment
- Fixed incorrect Web Resource Directory mapping in IntelliJ - Registered src/main/webapp as the proper web root - Enabled recognition of web.xml and static/view resources - Resolved unresolved class/package errors (e.g., DispatcherServlet, ContextLoaderListener)

chore: add static resource directories and configure servlet-context.xml
- Created /static/css, /static/js, and /static/img directories under src/main/webapp - Set up mvc:resources mapping in servlet-context.xml to serve static files from /static/** - Configured component scanning for com.bookstore package - Registered InternalResourceViewResolver for JSP views under /WEB-INF/views/ - Included Swagger resource handlers for future API documentation

chore: configure Oracle XE datasource, MyBatis, and transaction in root-context.xml
- Set JDBC URL to jdbc:oracle:thin:@localhost:1521:XE - Updated driver class to oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver - Username set to 'system'
- Registered SqlSessionFactory and SqlSessionTemplate for MyBatis integration - Enabled automatic mapper scanning for com.bookstore.mapper - Configured DataSourceTransactionManager - Activated @Transactional support using annotation-driven configuration

chore: ï¸ add target/ and IDE-specific files to .gitignore
- Added .gitignore entries to exclude build output (/target/) and IDE-specific files (/workspace.xml, /dataSources/, etc.) to keep the repository clean and portable across environments.
